title: Welcome to the 2015 Ranked Season [Share your Placements]

embed.description: After two months of preseason updates and tweaks, it's time to drop the curtain and begin the League of Legends 2015 ranked season! As with previous seasons, your first ten ranked games will result in your tier and division placement - after that it's down to you to fight your way up the ladder towards new heights.

body:
It's finally here. Good luck with your placement rankings and let us know how you do. 

For glory and justice all!

replies.body:
Plat 5 to Silver 4. 

Thanks Riot. It took me 2 years to climb to that MMR, and 1 day to drop.
Well...Last season I got up to Bronze 1 before the reset...So more than likely I'll end back up in B5 and have to climb my way back up once again...

> [{quoted}](name=LaughMask,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-21T20:07:49.823+0000)
>
> Well...Last season I got up to Bronze 1 before the reset...So more than likely I'll end back up in B5 and have to climb my way back up once again...

Hey, don't sell yourself short. :) Aim high, get that Gold.
{{champion:45}} "Is that a short joke?!?"
Is that even possible in placements to go from B1 to Gold? I watched a friend do his placements last season from B5, won 9/10 games and ended up only in B2.

Yeah your soft reset seems to be more heavy handed face slap, Riot.

I was in Silver 5 to end the season and was about 70 lp.

I just went 7-3 in my promos and somehow I got placed in Bronze 2? That doesn't even make any damn sense. you know how demoralizing it is to do that good in promos and be punished for it? What's the point of doing good if you get placed WAY lower than you started? That is dumb and kind of makes me lose any motivation to ever play ranked again right there.

I have only been in silver this entire friggin season and yet...somehow I go quite positive in my promos and get lowered an entire division and 2 ranks.

Please explain how this isn't complete b.s.

"Glory and justice for all"

Lets talk about justice.  Season two I was silver, left for months because of the army, came back and you decayed me to Bronze 5.  I dug my way out for the entire third season and finally got back into silver season 4.  So,I was hopeful for these placement matches.  My used to be duo partner (my brother) hit plat as you decayed me into a bottomless pit that most of the players whom fall victim to claim it's impossible to get out.  

I got out.  Because I don't believe in the option to "surrender".  I didnt give up.

I was hopeful because though I'm not as good as my brother, I was on a rise.  I felt like there was light at the end of the tunnel, my hard work would pay off.

I must mention the fact that my mmr has suffered enormously due to how HARD I have had to grind...and countless losses due to players who need not play ranked.

5/5 in my placement matches.  Despite all the trials of afk's and clueless players...I actually broke even!


So, what all came of this?  I'm now bronze 5 once again.  How embarrassing.  Not only is it embarrassing but it makes me want to find a game a little more...encouraging.

Remember MySpace?  You don't, because something came along that identified with what people wanted.

You spend all this time reworking the map, items, strategies, etc. and when the community couldn't be any more excited...

...you crush them.  Good job Riot.  You made yourself a waste of time by throwing the time we spent on you into the trash.

While I'm at it.  You want to know how to fix your system?  Make it impossible to lose the tier you earn!  Also, don't mix the tiers up.  It's hard to climb out of silver when I'm matched with people in bronze who are literally clueless...like come on dude...you gotta ward...or come on guys, we killed 4 of them...why are u running in different directions aimlessly?

So, with that said.  I think you need different conditions entirely to allow people to even play ranked.  Maybe it's harsh, but your level 30s who just hit, are basically level 5's still.  You have to control this better.  

-well, I guess it's back to the grind.

I had the exact same thing happen to me. I started at Silver 4 during season 4, then moved down to silver 5, then back to silver 4, then back to silver 5. You could say I belong around Silver 4-5, right? Well I had GIANT losing streaks during the preseason, and then during provisionals I won 2 and lost 8 and it wasn't my fault. I got put in Bronze 5. Here's my suggestion: quit. Maybe when so many people quit, Riot will realize how broken their MMR system really is.
Gold 5 to Bronze 1... thanks Rito... took me months to get out of bronze. took me another month to get to gold. now im back... in 1 day.
Considering what happened last season I expect to go 4-6 in the placements and drop from S5 to B5.  And probably stop playing League....

> [{quoted}](name=Grey Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-01-21T21:56:29.800+0000)
>
> Considering what happened last season I expect to go 4-6 in the placements and drop from S5 to B5.  And probably stop playing League....

I just went 7-3 and somehow dropped from silver 5 to bronze 2. This reset was garbage. No way to gain traction when I get punished for going positive.

It is like someone in Riot thinks we like promo series.  It is the worst thing in the game, since it amplifies all the other bad experiences we have (trolls, AFKers, etc).  I thought they would have learned their lesson after the season 4 debacle but from what I am seeing on these boards that is not the case.  

Honestly, I would like the person that came up with the formula for Season 5 placements to be fired.
My point exactly.

Last year placements I went 4-6 and got into silver 4
This year I go 7-3 and I got bronze 4?
Screw this game..

s4 all the way down to b5

my sides rito

i got so many questions rito. all of them punishable by tribunal.
Can't wait to get dragged from Bronze 3 to Bronze 5!
I think its safe to say they have no idea what they are doing when it comes to managing ranked tiers. Who ever made this decision to make ranked like this needs to be fired. seriously.

I've never had such bad placement matches in my life. 7 out of the 10 games every single lane on my team would get demolished (and at least one or two had someone straight up intentionally trolling). I am now in bronze for the first time in my life despite being gold for the last 2 seasons. =/ I am greatly disheartened.
Considering I was silver II, I hope to get at least Gold.

> [{quoted}](name=Fluffysaurus Rex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-01-21T20:32:58.602+0000)
>
> Considering I was silver II, I hope to get at least Gold.

Nope. According to Riot, you will always start lower than you ended last season... So even if you win 10 straight placement matches, you're going to be lower than S2. It's their way of screwing over people wanting a fresh start, but babying high elo players who don't want to drop too much.

Essentially you will be placed 4-5 levels below whatever you ended with last season... So you'll probably get S5.

I really wish Riot allowed us to hard reset so we don't have our previous season affecting our new season at all. I ended silver in 2014 season but I climbed up to G3 in the offseason... Now when I'm done with my placements I'll probably be S5 even if I win all of them.

Huzzah...
Whats the point in playing ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=Demonsolder21,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=000900000003,timestamp=2015-01-25T08:23:03.550+0000)
>
> Whats the point in playing ranked.

People try harder and throw less.

I was plat 3 on LAN gaining 31LP per game. I lost 6 and won 4. Now I'm plat 3 on Lan gaining 31LP per game. Pretty fair in my book.

**people try harder and throw less.**

Not in low elo.

Report from a casual League of Legends player:

I started playing LoL at the end of Season 3. In fact, I got placed in Bronze 1 the day before Season 3 ended (3W-7L). I then saw all divisions of Bronze in Season 4, before ultimately taking a break from LoL when our baby was born. I was in Bronze 2 until the season reset. 

I just finished my Season 5 placements last night and was placed in Bronze 1 (7W-3L). I was honestly expecting to be placed lower, but was pleasantly surprised to find myself placed higher than last season. I fully expect to get into Silver in the next few games. I was playing with quite a few Silvers from last season, and I feel like I can compete on that level now.

My matches went as follows:
1 - Katarina - Win (1-0)
2 - Braum - Loss (1-1)
3 - Janna - Win (2-1)
4 - Janna - Win (3-1)
5 - Janna - Loss  (3-2) - My client crashed but I was able to get back in after the first 5 minutes - all lanes lost, and the game ended quickly
6 - Janna - Win (4-2) - Two guys fought over ADC (Vayne and Corki) - I ended up going mid against Ziggs... as Janna with support runes and masteries - everyone finally calmed down and worked like a team - We aced and rushed their Nexus with only 1 Nexus tower of our own
7 - Katarina - Win (5-2)
8 - Katarina - Win (6-2) - Troll concerns due to champ select miscommunication - Keeping positive as the game started I told my team, "I see a crazy way we can win this big." - We had a decisive victory - 21 min Surrender
9 - Katarina - Loss (6-3)
10 - Janna - Win (7-3)

All in all, I had great teams, no DCs (other than mine), and very little argument. I friended quite a few people who were on my teams. When you find good teammates, keep them!

Just wanted to share my positive experience, since it seems most people had a rough go in placements. Even if you main support (as do I), you can do a lot to help your team succeed. Primarily, be positive, be encouraging, be forgiving, and have fun, win or lose.

Keep calm and Climb on!
Corrigendum

Has everyone noticed how "RIotSweet" only comments on neutral posts. Obviously the management have told them to keep quiet for now while they monitor the player backlash from their dreadful Season 5 Promo mechanics.

Thanks riot. Thanks for continuing to be "Player Focused".. mhm

> [{quoted}](name=cuppehcakejay,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=005a,timestamp=2015-01-23T21:45:52.806+0000)
>
> Has everyone noticed how "RIotSweet" only comments on neutral posts. Obviously the management have told them to keep quiet for now while they monitor the player backlash from their dreadful Season 5 Promo mechanics.
> 
> Thanks riot. Thanks for continuing to be "Player Focused".. mhm

We are encouraged as Rioters to comments on things we have knowledge and expertise in. I don't work on balance or tuning of the ranked system so the feedback contained in this post (or on the Boards) aimed specifically at the latter is going to field little input from me. However I will comment on things that I have expertise in and if I am not able to, try to pass it off to Rioters who do.  

The Boards are a great community. There are a lot of people here looking for help in the game, wanting to share their stories, or make jokes and have fun. It's nice to bond over our shared experiences. 

That is the essence of this discussion. Vent, celebrate, tell your tales of glory or defeat. It's a place to share those feeling with fellow players.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sweet,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=005a0000,timestamp=2015-01-23T22:53:53.867+0000)
>
> We are encouraged as Rioters to comments on things we have knowledge and expertise in. I don't work on balance or tuning of the ranked system so the feedback contained in this post (or on the Boards) aimed specifically at the latter is going to field little input from me. However I will comment on things that I have expertise in and if I am not able to, try to pass it off to Rioters who do.  
> 
> The Boards are a great community. There are a lot of people here looking for help in the game, wanting to share their stories, or make jokes and have fun. It's nice to bond over our shared experiences. 
> 
> That is the essence of this discussion. Vent, celebrate, tell your tales of glory or defeat. It's a place to share those feeling with fellow players.

Well no offence, but you are the only rioter i have seen post ever since the reset and personally i don't agree with that. I'm happy you are posting but where are the balance teams. I'd like to see if this is a mistake or just a new system that you are trying.

> [{quoted}](name=Zyconz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=005a00000000,timestamp=2015-01-24T00:54:30.460+0000)
>
> Well no offence, but you are the only rioter i have seen post ever since the reset and personally i don't agree with that. I'm happy you are posting but where are the balance teams. I'd like to see if this is a mistake or just a new system that you are trying.

I'll do my best to check in with the guys on the rankings squad. See if I can get any insights or toss this thread their way. I'm still reading through all your comments regardless as well — even if I can't make a measured difference I want your frustrations to be heard.

Something you gys did or change in the Algorithm for matchmaking is severely broken. I get matched with 2 brand new 30s on my team who don't even have Runes and the enemy teams gets a full set of Veteran players.

No idea what you guys did but, I've never had such lopsided matches as I did yesterday when I finally decided to do my placements. The whole system seems completely messed up.
I honestly dont understand how the placing system works. like what it bases itself off of. I went 6-4 in my placements this year and got stuck in B4.
Went 5 - 5 in placements... Went from Silver 5 to Bronze 5... FML!
Hopefully I can end this next season higher than Silver V lol.

I won 9 ranked games out of 10, I thought i am suppose to be in gold.
Why did I get to B3 only?

I'm in the awkward position where I won my last 10 ranked games, and now I'm reluctant to tackle my placements since going on a 20 ranked win streak is improbable to say the least.

I know the situation isn't going to get any easier so I'll have to bite the bullet eventually, but ladder anxiety is a thing even before I get on the ladder.
Have yet to be placed. Am nervous.

> [{quoted}](name=kayakninja,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-01-21T20:23:03.309+0000)
>
> Have yet to be placed. Am nervous.

You've got this. Good luck in your placements!
Gotta work tonight and tomorrow, but who knows, prob gonna give it a try over the weekend, may climb a rank or two.

> [{quoted}](name=Kuroi86,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ai771PvU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-21T19:56:11.469+0000)
>
> Gotta work tonight and tomorrow, but who knows, prob gonna give it a try over the weekend, may climb a rank or two.

Hope your matches go well.
Wow this post is terrifying i was B5 last season and im 6-2 in provisional so ill probably end up in wood 43
I just LOVE that i was S5 and ran up to S3 last season, and i go 7-3, to be punished with B4. I cant thank Riot enough! Oh boy Elo Hell!{{summoner:14}}

Sure feels like Riot could have saved us all some painful matches by just making every ranked player start a full tier lower than they ended last season.  I don't mind the challenge of fighting my way up the tiers in a new season.  It sure would have been nice to skip the crap from heightened nerves of teammates and the drama of trolls who enjoyed the extra pain they could seemingly inflict.  Reading how little the placements did for even those that won 9 of them, I think I'd have rather seen Riot do a plain old hard reset.

This is a fun game, but sometimes Riot should give a lot more clarity about what players can expect.  The start of this new season seems a little sloppy.  I do love the game design changes however (jungle in particular).

Went from gold 5 to bronze 1 and now I'm getting bad teammates idk what you did to my placements but I don't approve this at all riot hate to say it but I'm very disappointed in these placements.. 5 wins and 5 losses too
In season 4 I didn't win any of my 10 games and I got Bronze 4.  But then this year I win 6 of my 10 going 6-4 and I get Bronze 5? I don't get it. I carried all of my games too. I don't get it man.

Well, last season I made it to Silver IV after only playing for a few months. Won six out of ten matches then, and won six out of ten this season. Only difference is that I somehow pulled Bronze IV after playing players that were higher MMR than they were in my last provisionals. Anyone know how to explain this to me? Cause I'm completely lost on how it happened.
Everyone is complaining about bronze so what they did is make everyone go bronze. lol what logic is this......#confused

Went 5-5 on my placements. (2 losses, 2 wins, loss, 2 wins, loss, win, loss)

I ended season 4 at Gold IV, right before the reset.

I placed Silver 3.

Riot, I don't understand how your MMR works at all.

So, can I get some clarification? If I am S5 am I 100% going to bronze? 

I have another account I am ready to start ranked with was just wondering if I should even bother with this account....

I've gone 6-4 in my placements the past two years, landing in Silver II my first time and Silver III my second. I have little reason to doubt I'll manage a similar performance this time.

Maybe I'll play ranked beyond my placements more than just every couple of months this time >.>
Okay. I will probably do that. I'll either do it later tonight or sometime tomorrow.

was plat 5 before the reset went 7-3 and was placed in plat 4. 

definitely an improvement in this years placements compared to last years a lot more evenly matched players during the provisionals.

keep it up riot, i like what you're doing
